title: The Oracle's Prophecy
description: Guided by an oracle's prophecy, the player embarks on a quest to retrieve a set of enchanted crystals needed to prevent an impending catastrophe.
subquest: Seek the ancient oracle's guidance to learn about the prophecy.
Traverse dangerous terrains to find the first enchanted crystal.
Solve puzzles in the hidden temple to obtain the second crystal.
Brave the treacherous swamp to retrieve the third crystal.
Outsmart the guardian of the ancient ruins to obtain the fourth crystal.
Uncover the final crystal's location in the depths of the mystical cave.
